comment:
>>38121366

> [[ UI Messenger – Tatsumaki ]]
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Heyo.
> [[ Tatsumaki ]]: hi :D
> [[ Tatsumaki ]]: ?
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Where are you and Aelriss?

A few seconds' pause.

> [[ Tatsumaki ]]: underground: averron city – market district
> [[ Tatsumaki ]]: ?
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Gotcha, thanks.
> [[ Tatsumaki ]]: ok

You arrive at the guild hall district. It's quiet, and the ground is marred and cracked, evidence that this place was just recently cleaned up after a large battle. The halls look about the same, fortified buildings with steps leading up toward the heavy front doors. Banners proudly display the identity of each guild; the largest buildings belong to the Averron Alliance, and you see one further down the road that looks like the Guard's barracks.

There's mailboxes outside each hall, as well as a plaque with each guild's name.

> Visit the Crimson Guardians.
> Visit the Writ Keepers.
> Return to the city center.
> Other.
name: BSO
